name.japanese: 人生バラ色ライダーズ

keyMoments.title: Rosy Life Riders Assist Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The reformed Rosy Life Riders help the Straw Hats by using their flying fish to gather the scattered crew members and track down Camie's kidnappers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's transformation from enemies to loyal allies of the Straw Hat Pirates.

statusHistory.description: Reformed as Rosy Life Riders after Sanji fixed Duval's face

affiliations.description: Former enemies turned devoted allies after Sanji fixed Duval's face

trivia: Formerly known as the Flying Fish Riders, an enemy crew
Reformed and renamed after Sanji altered Duval's face to be handsome
Specialize in using flying fish for transportation and combat
Show extreme loyalty to Sanji whom they call their 'savior'
